Key Match Events: Trae Young hit a half-court buzzer-beater to win the game for the Hawks
Post-Match Reflections: The loss stings for the Jazz, but keeps them on track for their ultimate goal of maximizing their chances in the lottery
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lauri Markkanen had a game-high 35 points on 11-21 shooting from the field and 8-15 from three
Others: The Hawks won their 19th game of the season, despite being without Jalen Johnson
The Jazz are now 9-26 and 14th in the Western Conference
